  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1651</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The dark side of the sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die dunkle Seite der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le côté en noir du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O lado escuro do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il lato scuro del sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σκοτεινή πλευρά του ήλιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cara oscura del sol</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A webquest on the sun- Throughout this activity we will find out facts that we never imagined and we will gain a new insight into this wonderful star!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein webquest auf der Sonne während dieser 
Aktivität finden wir Tatsachen heraus, die wir uns nie vorstellten 
und wir gewinnen einen neuen Einblick in diesen wundervollen Stern!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un webquest sur le soleil dans toute cette 
activité nous découvrirons les faits que nous n'avons jamais 
imaginés et nous gagnerons une nouvelle perspicacité dans ce 
merveilleux tenons le premier rôle !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um o mais webquest no sol durante todo esta 
atividade nós encontraremos para fora os fatos que nós nunca 
imaginamos e nós ganharemos uma introspecção nova nesta estrela 
maravilhosa!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un più webquest sul sole durante questa 
attività scopriremo i fatti che non abbiamo immaginato mai e 
guadagneremo una nuova comprensione in questa stella meravigliosa!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας pjo' ωεψquεστ στον ήλιο - σε όλη αυτήν την 
δραστηριότητα θα ανακαλύψουμε τα γεγονότα που δεν φανταστήκαμε 
ποτέ και θα αποκτήσουμε μια νέα επίγνωση σε αυτό το θαυμάσιο 
αστέρϊ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Un la ma's webquest en el sol a través de esta 
actividad descubriremos los hechos que nunca imaginábamos y ganaremos
una nueva penetración en esta estrella maravillosa!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
